wiki.summary: Longtime friends and frequent collaborators Offset and Travis Scott reunite on the widely anticipated and hard-hitting track “SAY MY GRACE.” This track was first previewed in a club on January 14, 2023. Offset then went on to preview the song during an Instagram Live on April 5, 2023. On April 15th, 2023, Offset was brought out as a special guest during Scott’s set at Rolling Loud Thailand and the two performed the track live together for the first time. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: Longtime friends and frequent collaborators Offset and Travis Scott reunite on the widely anticipated and hard-hitting track “SAY MY GRACE.” This track was first previewed in a club on January 14, 2023. Offset then went on to preview the song during an Instagram Live on April 5, 2023. On April 15th, 2023, Offset was brought out as a special guest during Scott’s set at Rolling Loud Thailand and the two performed the track live together for the first time. After months of speculation, the song was finally confirmed to be on Offset’s SET IT OFF album in a tweet by Offset on September 13, 2023. The track’s music video, filmed in Pattaya, Thailand, was released on October 13, 2023, alongside the release of SET IT OFF. Read more on Last.fm.
